disconnection.title: Oh No!
disconnection.message: It looks like we lost connection with your remote. Please make sure it is accessible on your network.

spotify.message: To create the required Spotify application:
spotify.stepThree: Select Create An App. Enter any name and description
spotify.stepFour: Once your application is created, view it and copy your Client ID and Client Secret into the input boxes below
spotify.stepSix: Click Save after adding the URI
spotify.stepSeven: Click the Authenticate button (you will be redirect to login into Spotify)
spotify.stepEight: If you're happy with the name you have provided, hit Save
